# Horus Technology

> San Diego AWS consulting firm specializing in Generative AI, Intelligent Document Processing, and cloud transformation. Led by former AWS engineers.

## About

Horus Technology is an AWS consulting and AI/ML solutions firm based in San Diego, California. Our team includes former AWS engineers who specialize in building enterprise-grade cloud and AI solutions.

## Services

### AWS Consulting
- Cloud migration and modernization
- AWS architecture design and optimization
- Cost optimization (average 40% reduction)
- Managed cloud services and 24/7 support

### Generative AI Solutions
- Large Language Model (LLM) implementation
- Custom model fine-tuning on proprietary data
- Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) systems
- AI strategy consulting for enterprises

### Intelligent Document Processing (IDP)
- Automated document extraction using AWS Textract
- Text analysis and classification with Amazon Comprehend
- Human-in-the-loop validation with Amazon A2I
- Workflow orchestration with AWS Step Functions
- Document types: invoices, contracts, medical records, insurance claims, legal documents

### Spatial Computing
- Digital twins
- AR/VR enterprise applications
- 3D data visualization

## Results We Deliver

- 70% reduction in document processing time
- 99.2% extraction accuracy with human-in-the-loop validation
- 40% average AWS cost reduction
- 60-75% cost savings vs manual processing

## Industries Served

- Healthcare and vital records processing
- Financial services and banking
- Legal and contract management
- Manufacturing and logistics
- Education and academic institutions
- Real estate and property management

## Location

San Diego, California, USA
Serving San Diego, Orange County, and Southern California
Also serving national enterprise clients remotely

## Case Studies

### Healthcare Document Processing
Helped a vital records provider process healthcare identity documents using AWS Generative AI, reducing turnaround time from days to minutes with 98-99% accuracy.

### Contract Review Automation
Built a contract-intelligence platform on AWS that reduces contract review time from hours to minutes without increasing headcount.

### College Catalog Data Transformation
Transformed college catalog PDFs into structured course data for education data providers, reducing processing time from days to hours.

### Virtual Mailbox Automation
Automated mail processing for a virtual mailbox provider using Generative AI, reducing costs by 60% and processing time from hours to minutes.

## Technology Stack

- AWS Services: Textract, Comprehend, Bedrock, SageMaker, Lambda, Step Functions, A2I
- AI/ML: Large Language Models, RAG, Custom Fine-Tuning
- Cloud: AWS architecture, serverless, microservices
